name: Galaclick
description:
Info

Galaclick is a fast paced bullet hell shmup with a twist! Set in the theme of a cosmic space shooter, the player can use their "buggy mouse" to do things they aren't usually allowed to do, whether that be dragging enemies, cheating health or destroying bullets!

Credits

This game was made for the Major Jam, by the patchwork coffee team!

🚀 Scott Stamp -Team Manager and Concept/Pixel Artist

🌑 Jellybeans - Primary Programmer

🛸 Pixelmochii (moi :p) - Primary Pixel Artist and Secondary Programmer

👾 HAID - Composer, Sound Designer and Voice of the Game

Resources we used:

Everything, including the art, music and sfx, was made by us!

We used a free GMS2 CRT Shader for the CRT effect, by ZIK

Hope you enjoy!
